aka: The Winter Dream Does Not Fly
trans_title: The Winter Dream Does Not Fly
introduction: SYNOPSISTwenty-nine year old Seo Sung-yim and twenty-six year old Shin Gil-woo want to escape from the boredom of everyday life. They meet accidentally and set out on a journey together. They spend their money as if they're trying to get back at the world and get immense pleasure from this. Although they are together for only a short time, they begin to understand each other. But Gil-woo's death takes him back to is former life and Sung-yim goes back to his everyday existence as if nothing ever happened.故事29岁的要挂出寻找出路gwontaeroum林独行26岁singilwoo日常生活中携带，满足了大量的资金花在旅游的机会。他们觉得，如果多个世界货币写作的乐趣。虽然时间很短，他们了解对方，甚至对塔。但是，哭注定死恢复到其原来的生活方式也寻找的一天到一天的福祉作为若无其事的外观。
